TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 启用作为 Web 服务对 ASP.NET Forms 身份验证的访问。

span.span: Enables access to ASP.NET forms authentication as a Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对象，可以通过 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务对用户进行身份验证。The object enables you to authenticate users through a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service. 当必须从存储用户凭据的 Web 应用程序之外的应用程序对用户进行身份验证时，请使用 WCF 身份验证服务。You use the WCF authentication service when you must authenticate users through ASP.NET membership from an application that is outside the Web application that stores the user credentials. 应用程序必须能够以 SOAP 格式发送和使用消息。The application must be able to send and consume message in the SOAP format. 通过 类，您可以登录用户，注销用户，验证凭据，检查身份验证状态，自定义身份验证，以及设置身份验证 cookie。Through the class, you can log users in, log users out, validate credentials, check authentication status, customize authentication, and set the authentication cookie. 类包含四种只应通过 WCF 服务访问的方法： 、 、 和 方法。The class contains four methods that you should access only through a WCF service: the , , , and methods. 若要调用这些方法，你可以在 Web 服务器上启用身份验证服务，然后将与 WCF 兼容的客户端应用程序连接到 Web 服务。To call these methods, you enable the authentication service on a Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service. 有关如何配置身份验证服务的信息，请参阅 [如何：启用 WCF 身份验证服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398990(v=vs.100))。For information about how to configure the authentication service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Authentication Service](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398990(v=vs.100)). 若要在上记录用户，请将用户凭据传递到 方法。To log users on, you pass the user credentials to the method. 如果凭据有效，则类将 创建一个身份验证 cookie。If the credentials are valid, the class creates an authentication cookie. 如果身份验证 cookie 未过期，你会知道用户的凭据已经过身份验证，你无需再次验证凭据。If the authentication cookie has not expired, you know that the user's credentials have been authenticated and you do not have to validate the credentials again. (不能通过类获取不太 Cookie 的身份验证 。 ) (Cookie-less authentication is not available through the class.) 可以引发两个事件： 和 。The can raise two events: and . 验证用户凭据时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user credentials are being validated. 为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以自定义验证用户凭据的方式。Create an event handler for the event to customize how user credentials are validated. 验证 用户凭据后设置身份验证 cookie 时发生此事件。The event occurs when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated. 为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以自定义身份验证 cookie。Create an event handler for the event to customize the authentication cookie. 方法检查用户凭据以进行身份验证，但不返回身份验证票证。The method checks user credentials for authentication, but it does not return an authentication ticket. 如果用户以前已登录，并且您必须检查凭据在新应用程序会话开始时是否仍然有效，则使用。Use when a user has previously logged in and you must check that the credentials are still valid at the start of a new application session. 有关从控制台应用程序中使用 WCF 身份验证服务的示例，请参阅 [演练：使用 ASP.NET 应用程序服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb515342(v=vs.100))。For an example of using the WCF authentication service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb515342(v=vs.100)).

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 身份验证服务概述

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event Authenticating As EventHandler(Of AuthenticatingEventArgs)

summary.span: 当验证用户凭据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when user credentials are being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证用户凭据时，将引发事件。The event is raised when user credentials are being validated. 为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以自定义验证用户凭据的方式。Create an event handler for the event to customize how user credentials are validated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在 global.asax 文件的方法中绑定事件的事件处理程序 `Application_Start` 。The following example shows how to bind an event handler for the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示了 global.asax 文件中的事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows an event handler for the event in the Global.asax file. 该事件处理程序从属性中读取两个身份验证值 ，并将用户名和密码传递给名为的自定义身份验证类 `StudentAuthentication` 。The event handler reads two authentication values from the property and passes them together with the user name and password to a custom authentication class named `StudentAuthentication`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#2)]

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 身份验证服务概述

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event CreatingCookie As EventHandler(Of CreatingCookieEventArgs)

summary.span: 当设置身份验证 Cookie 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the authentication cookie is being set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证 用户凭据后设置身份验证 cookie 时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated. 为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以自定义身份验证 cookie。Create an event handler for the event to customize the authentication cookie. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将事件处理程序绑定到 global.asax 文件的方法中的事件 `Application_Start` 。The following example shows how to bind an event handler to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#1)] 下面的示例演示了 global.asax 文件中的事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows an event handler for the event in the Global.asax file. 事件处理程序通过将属性中的值添加到属性，自定义身份验证 cookie 。The event handler customizes the authentication cookie by adding the value in the property to the property. 仅当您知道属性中的数据不敏感时，才将属性存储在 cookie 中。Store the property in a cookie only if you know that the data in the property is not sensitive. 恶意用户可以访问 cookie 中的值。Malicious users can access the values in the cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 身份验证服务概述

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsLoggedIn() cil managed

summary.span: 确定当前用户是否已经过身份验证。

span.span: Determines whether the current user is authenticated.

returns.span: 如果该用户已经过身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has been authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过检查. 属性来检查当前用户是否已通过身份验证 。The method checks whether the current user is authenticated by checking the .property. > [!NOTE] > 不要 从在 Web 服务器上执行的代码中调用方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 仅将方法作为 WCF 服务的一部分来调用。You call the method only as part of a WCF service.

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 身份验证服务概述

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Login (string username, string password, string customCredential, bool isPersistent);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Login(string username, string password, string customCredential, bool isPersistent) cil managed
Public Function Login (username As String, password As String, customCredential As String, isPersistent As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool Login(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ customCredential, bool isPersistent);
member this.Login : string * string * string * bool -> bool

span.span: The user name to be validated.
The password for the specified user.

param.name: customCredential
param.span: 要验证的除 和 之外的一个或多个值（如果有）。

span.span: The value or values to validate in addition to and , if any.

param.name: isPersistent
param.span: 指示身份验证票证在各会话中是否都保持有效的一个值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the authentication ticket remains valid across sessions.

summary.span: 检查用户凭据，如果凭据有效，则创建一个身份验证票证 (Cookie)。

span.span: Checks user credentials and creates an authentication ticket (cookie) if the credentials are valid.

returns.span: 如果用户凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if user credentials are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过成员资格提供程序验证用户凭据。The method validates user credentials through a membership provider. 您可以使用默认的成员资格提供程序，也可以在运行时指定自定义成员资格提供程序。You can use the default membership provider or specify a custom membership provider at run time. 类将 `userName` 和传递 `password` 给成员资格提供程序的 方法，但不通过 `customCredential` 。The class passes `userName` and `password` to the membership provider's method, but does not pass `customCredential`. 如果 返回 `true` ，则 创建一个作为 cookie 的身份验证票证。If returns `true`, creates an authentication ticket as a cookie. 将 `isPersistent` 参数设置为， `true` 以创建一个持续于当前会话之外的身份验证票证。Set the `isPersistent` parameter to `true` to create an authentication ticket that lasts beyond the current session. > [!NOTE] > 始终使用身份验证服务和安全套接字层 (SSL，方法是使用 HTTPS) 来保护敏感数据。Always use the authentication service together with the secure sockets layer (SSL, by using HTTPS) to protect sensitive data. 方法引发 事件和 事件。The method raises the event and the event. 创建的事件处理程序 以自定义身份验证，如检查中的值 `customCredential` 或通过非默认的成员资格提供程序验证凭据。Create an event handler for to customize authentication, such as checking the values in `customCredential` or validating credentials through a non-default membership provider. `customCredential`默认的成员资格提供程序不验证中的值。The values in `customCredential` are not validated by the default membership provider. 若要自定义身份验证 cookie，请创建的事件处理程序 。To customize the authentication cookie, create an event handler for . > [!NOTE] > 不要 从在 Web 服务器上执行的代码中调用方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 仅将方法作为 WCF 服务的一部分来调用。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)).

span.span: or is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed

summary.span: 清除浏览器中的身份验证票证 (Cookie)。

span.span: Clears the authentication ticket (cookie) in the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从浏览器的 cookie 集合中清除身份验证 cookie。The method clears the authentication cookie from the browser's cookie collection. 用户必须再次登录才能进行身份验证。The user must log in again to be authenticated. 类不会存储有关已清除了哪些身份验证票证的服务器上的信息。The class does not store information on the server about which authentication tickets have been cleared. > [!NOTE] > 不要 从在 Web 服务器上执行的代码中调用方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 仅将方法作为 WCF 服务的一部分来调用。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)).

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 身份验证服务概述

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

Public Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String, customCredential As String) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ customCredential);
member this.ValidateUser : string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The user name to be validated.
The password for the specified user.

param.name: customCredential
param.span: 要验证的除 和 之外的一个或多个值（如果有）。

span.span: The value or values to validate in addition to and , if any.

summary.span: 在不颁发身份验证票证的情况下对用户凭据进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates user credentials without issuing an authentication ticket.

returns.span: 如果用户凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对用户凭据进行身份验证，但不设置身份验证 cookie。The method authenticates the user credentials but does not set an authentication cookie. 如果没有身份验证 cookie，则即使凭据有效，用户也不会登录。Without an authentication cookie, the user will not be logged in even if the credentials are valid. 如果在不接收身份验证 cookie 的情况下必须检查用户的凭据是否有效，请使用方法。Use the method when you must check whether a user's credentials are valid without receiving an authentication cookie. 例如，如果身份验证 cookie 已存储在客户端应用程序中，但你想要验证用户的凭据在新会话启动时仍然有效，则可以执行此操作。For example, you might do this if the authentication cookie is already stored in a client application but you want to verify that the user's credentials are still valid when a new session starts. 方法引发 事件，但不引发 事件。The method raises the event, but does not raise the event. > [!NOTE] > 不要 从在 Web 服务器上执行的代码中调用方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 仅将方法作为 WCF 服务的一部分来调用。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)).

span.span: or is .
